original_title: ワールドカップ観戦ナンパ！
overview: Shibuya is excited at the World Cup. Do you know that there was a battle that Japan could never lose in this city that night when they defeated Colombia 2-1? "Take a ride to the World Cup and score a hat-trick at night!!" And Shibuya of the festival that went out with the samurai soul burning blue hidden in the chest! Perhaps because of Japan's victory, the two beautiful women...
title: Soccer National Team, Two Beauty Model
